verses.verse: And <S%H7725>again<s%> I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%>, <S%H3318>and<s%>, behold, there came <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4818>chariots<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> from between <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> were <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>; and in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>;

and in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>; and in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H1261>grizzled<s%> <S%H554>strong<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>.
Then I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H113>me<s%>, What are these, my lord?

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H702>me<s%>, These are the four <S%H7307>winds<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, which go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H3320>standing<s%> before the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

The chariot wherein are the <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>; and the <S%H3836>white<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1261>them<s%>; and the grizzled went <S%H3318>forth<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>.

And the <S%H554>strong<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> that they might walk to and <S%H1980>fro<s%> through the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Get you <S%H3212>hence<s%>, walk to and <S%H1980>fro<s%> through the <S%H776>earth<s%>. So they walked to and <S%H1980>fro<s%> through the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Then <S%H2199>cried<s%> he <S%H853>to<s%> <S%H1696>me<s%>, and spake unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, they that <S%H3318>go<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> have <S%H5117>quieted<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Take <S%H3947><s%> of them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, even of <S%H2469>Heldai<s%>, of <S%H2900>Tobijah<s%>, and of <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>; and <S%H935>come<s%> thou the same <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%>, whither they are <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

yea <S%H3947><s%>, take of them <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5850>crowns<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> them upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak<s%>, the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

and <S%H559>speak<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, Thus <S%H559>speaketh<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H376>Behold<s%>, the man whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H6780>Branch<s%>: and he shall grow <S%H6779>up<s%> out of his <S%H1129>place<s%>; and he shall build the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;

even he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H1935>glory<s%>, and shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H4910>rule<s%> upon his <S%H3678>throne<s%>; and he shall be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> upon his <S%H3678>throne<s%>; and the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> shall be between them <S%H8147>both<s%>.

And the <S%H5850>crowns<s%> shall be to <S%H2494>Helem<s%>, and to <S%H2900>Tobijah<s%>, and to <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>, and to <S%H2581>Hen<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%>, for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And they that are far <S%H7350>off<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto <S%H8085>you<s%>. And this shall come to pass, if ye will diligently <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
